# Key Information {-}

This is the Spring 2018 syllabus page for PQHS / CRSP / MPHP 432: Data Science for Biological, Medical and Health Research II, taught by Professor Thomas Love. The course is given on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 1:00 to 2:15 PM, in a location to be announced.

## Course Home Page {-}

The course home page, with links to everything else you'll need, is at https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/432-2018.

## Getting Help! {-}

To get help for anything related to the course, email the Teaching Assistants and Dr. Love at `431-help@case.edu`.

- Dr. Love is available on Tuesdays and Thursdays at CWRU, by appointment. To make an appointment, email him at `thomas.love@case.edu`. His office is Wood WG-82 L.
    + If you have any special concerns about the course, need special accommodations or any other issues for Dr. Love, please email or speak with him before or after class.
